edge: Jon Ekstrand, who composed the score for Morbius, also composed scores for Espinosa's previous films.
The score for Morbius, composed by Jon Ekstrand, was released digitally by Madison Gate Records on April 8, 2022.
The score for Morbius, titled 'Morbius (soundtrack)', was released digitally by Madison Gate Records.
By October 2019, Jon Ekstrand was set to compose the score for Morbius.
